4af37287-62ac-4d28-8de9-dc5e908408ef.description: The 'HCM Foundation level certification' exam validates that the candidate possesses the fundamental knowledge required of the Ramco implementer's profile for configuring and implementing Ramco HR and Payroll functions. This certification exam is recommended as an entry level qualification.
4af37287-62ac-4d28-8de9-dc5e908408ef.name: Ramco HRP L1 - Foundation Level

badge_template_activities.title: A foundation certification examination usually consisting of 30 multiple choice, and/or multiple response questionnaires with the minimum passing score of 70%. There is no negative marking. Candidates have a maximum time of 40 minutes to complete.
